content: 3dc 1sc or work a second round like round 1 for fuzzy effect continue working next round into first round of edge in red if there is already a stitch in the round below from the leaves work second stitch in same stitch round 2 3 chain 1 double_crochet in each single_crochet of round below finish round with sl in 3rd chain of beginning round 3-4 3 chain 1 double_crochet in each double_crochet of round below finish round with sl in 3rd chain of beginning handles red lay bag flat to half 4 centimeter from right edge work 5 single_crochet on upper edge continue in row until desired length fix handle 4 centimeter from left edge work second handle the same way make a draw string make a chain ribbon 80 centimeter long and work sl over the complete length pull thread through the tunnel of round 1 bag attach a drawstring slide available at a notions counter or fabric store i have translated this pretty easy pattern as good as i could if anything is not clear or wrong please feel free to contact me and leave a comment
